text: The 2012 Missouri Valley Conference men's soccer season was the 22nd season of men's varsity soccer in the conference. The 2012 Missouri Valley Conference Men's Soccer Tournament was hosted by Bradley and won by Creighton. == Teams == == MVC Tournament == == See also == * Missouri Valley Conference * Missouri Valley Conference men's soccer tournament * 2012 NCAA Division I men's soccer season * 2012 in American soccer == References == Category:Missouri Valley Conference Category:2012 NCAA Division I men's soccer season
title: 2012 Missouri Valley Conference men's soccer season
